title: Download problem
body: [_**Click Here**_](http://imgur.com/a/dbAN1) : this is photo for my LoL while i am downloading it and it is 30% but when i close the game and open it again, it return to 0% and my internet is slow i cant download 14800 mb in one time i want to close it and in the next day i resume the download what should i do ?

replies.body: Currently, our patching process doesn't have a way to pause and resume the download at a later time. You'll need to let that patch fully complete in one sitting before you're able to play!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=b2rYMu8v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-23T02:49:27.333+0000)
>
> Currently, our patching process doesn't have a way to pause and resume the download at a later time. You'll need to let that patch fully complete in one sitting before you're able to play!

Do you have a solution to provide for people unable to download the whole thing in one sitting?
(Slow connection, unstable connection, etc)
